豝字的基本解释

豝
bā
母猪：“壹发五豝。”
干肉：“帝豝之祸实昉此。”

豝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bā］
［《廣韻》伯加切，平麻，幫。］
(1)母猪。
(2)两岁的猪。《周礼·夏官·大司马》“大獸公之，小禽私之”郑玄注引汉郑司农曰：“《詩》云：'言私其豵，獻肩於公。'一歲爲豵，二歲爲豝，三歲爲特，四歲爲肩，五歲爲慎。”一说指一岁的兽。
(3)大猪。
(4)通“羓”。干肉。

豝字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豝； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1195第05
【唐韻】伯加切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】邦加切，?音巴。【說文】牝豕也。一曰二歲，能相把拏也。【埤雅】把拏，蕃之意也。【詩·召南】壹發五豝。【傳】豕牝曰豝。【周禮·夏官·大司馬註】二歲爲豝。　又【小爾雅】大者謂之豝。【何承天·纂文】漁陽以大豬爲豝。　又【韻會】通作羓。腊屬。【五代史·四夷附錄】耶律德光卒，契丹破其腹，實之以鹽，載之而走，晉人謂之帝豝。　【集韻】或作?。

豝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
豝字的起名意思

暂无。

female pig
Basic explanation of words
female pig
bā
Sow: "One hair and five worms."
Dried meat: "The disaster of the emperor is really gone."
female pig
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bā］
["Guangyun" Bergach, Pingma, Bang. ]
(1) The sow.
(2) Two-year-old pig. "Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Da Sima" "The big beast is the master, the small bird is private." Zheng Xuan's annotation quoted Han Zheng Sinong as saying: "The Poetry says: "Speak privately, give shoulders to the public." It is a pig, two years old is a pig, three years old is special, four years old is shoulders, and five years old is Shen." One refers to a one-year-old beast.
(3) Big pig.
(4) Through "羓". Dried meat.
female pig
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Wu Character Department] 　豝; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1195 No. 05
[Tang Yun] Bergache [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Bangache,? Yinba. [Said the text] The hog also. One is two years old, so you can take it with you. [Piya] To take it is also the meaning of Fan. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】One hair five 豝. [Biography] The hog said the hog. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Da Sima Note】Two-year-old is a 豝.　[Xiao Erya] The big one is called 豝. 【He Chengtian · Compilation】Yuyang uses big pigs as pigs.　[Rhyme Club] Tong Zuo Lei. Wax genus. [Five Dynasties History·Siyi Appendix] Yelvde was born, the Khitan broke his abdomen, actually took salt, and carried it away, and the people of Jin called it the emperor.　【Jiyun】or make?.
female pig
